common.noPermission: You don't have permission to perform this action

health.permissionIssueDesc: The manager cannot write to some data directories. This typically happens after upgrading to v2.0.0, which runs as a non-root user (UID 1001) for security.
health.fixCommand: Run this command on your host to fix permissions

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.authRequiredDesc: Your server needs authentication for online features
dashboard.downloadCompleteDesc: Server files have been successfully downloaded. Now the server needs to be authenticated separately so players can join.
dashboard.authExpiredDesc: Server authentication has expired. Please re-authenticate to use online features.
dashboard.authMemoryOnlyDesc: Your server is authenticated, but the token is only stored in memory. You will need to re-authenticate after each server restart.

plugin.installHint: Install the plugin for accurate player data, server statistics, and real-time events.
plugin.restartHint: Restart the server to activate the plugin.
plugin.installSuccess: Plugin installed successfully. Restart the server to activate.
plugin.updateHint: Version {current} â†’ {latest}. Update the plugin for the latest features.
plugin.updateSuccess: Plugin updated successfully. Restart the server to activate.

console.title: Server Console
console.bypassWarning: Warning: Console access allows executing all server commands, bypassing UI permission restrictions.

backups.title: Backup Management
backups.name: Name
backups.confirmRestore: Restore backup? The server will be restarted.

players.title: Player Management
players.name: Name

gamemodes.adventureDesc: Explore and interact, can't break blocks

players.itemIdHint: Type to search or enter a custom item ID
players.pluginRequired: Plugin required for detailed player information
players.pluginHint: Install and start the KyuubiSoft API Plugin to see player details.

details.inventoryHint: Inventory data will be available once the Hytale API supports it.
details.appearanceHint: Appearance data will be available once the Hytale API supports it.
details.assetsHint: Extract assets to show item icons

whitelist.title: Whitelist & Bans
whitelist.enabledDescription: Only whitelisted players can join the server

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.permissionsPlaceholder:
One permission per line
e.g. hytale.command.kick
hytale.admin.*

worlds.title: Worlds
worlds.infoDescription: Here you can see all worlds available on the server. Worlds are automatically detected.

confirmDeleteOnUniverseStart.title: Delete world on universe start?
confirmDeleteOnUniverseStart.message: WARNING: When this option is enabled, this world will be PERMANENTLY DELETED when the universe (server) starts. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to enable this dangerous option?

confirmDeleteOnRemove.title: Delete world on remove?
confirmDeleteOnRemove.message: WARNING: When this option is enabled, this world will be PERMANENTLY DELETED when it is removed from the universe. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to enable this dangerous option?

config.title: Configuration
config.subtitle: Edit server configuration files
config.warning: Warning: Invalid configuration may break the server. A server restart is required after saving changes.
config.passwordHint: Leave empty to allow anyone to join

mods.title: Mods & Plugins
mods.subtitle: Manage server mods and plugins
mods.noStoreMods: No mods available in the store
mods.restartNote: Server restart required after enabling/disabling mods or plugins.
mods.selectConfig: Select a config file to edit
mods.storeDescription: Install popular mods with one click. Mods are downloaded from GitHub releases.
mods.modtaleDescription: Browse and install mods directly from modtale.net - the official Hytale mod platform.
mods.modtaleUnavailable: Modtale API unavailable. Please try again later.
mods.apiKeyInstructions: To get more requests per minute (300 instead of 10), create a free API key on modtale.net:
mods.apiKeyEnvInstructions: Add the key to your .env file:
mods.stackmartDescription: Browse and install free resources from StackMart.org - plugins, mods, scripts and tools.
mods.stackmartUnavailable: StackMart API unavailable. Please try again later.
mods.stackmartApiKeyInstructions: To use publisher features, create an API key on stackmart.org:

settings.title: Settings
settings.selectConfigFile: Select a configuration file to edit:
settings.configWarning: Warning: Invalid configuration may break the server. A server restart is required after saving.
settings.hytaleAuthDesc: Authenticate your server with Hytale to access online features
settings.authExpired: Authentication code expired. Please try again.
settings.patchlineDesc: Choose between the stable release version or the pre-release version for early access to new features.
settings.patchlineRestartNote: After changing the patchline, the server must be restarted for the change to take effect.
settings.patchlineRestartRequiredDesc: The patchline has been changed. The server must now be restarted to download the new version.
settings.patchlineRestarting: Server is restarting and downloading the new version...
settings.acceptEarlyPluginsDesc: Enable this option to allow the server to load early plugins. Early plugins are loaded before the server fully starts and may be unstable.
settings.acceptEarlyPluginsHint: Adds the --accept-early-plugins flag when starting the server
settings.acceptEarlyPluginsRestartNote: After changing this setting, the server must be restarted for the change to take effect.
settings.acceptEarlyPluginsRestartRequiredDesc: The setting has been changed. The server must now be restarted to apply the change.
settings.acceptEarlyPluginsRestarting: Server is restarting to apply the new setting...
settings.disableSentryDesc: Disable Sentry crash reporting during plugin development. This prevents development errors from being sent to Hytale.
settings.disableSentryHint: Adds the --disable-sentry flag when starting the server (recommended for plugin development)
settings.disableSentryRestartNote: After changing this setting, the server must be restarted for the change to take effect.
settings.disableSentryRestartRequiredDesc: The setting has been changed. The server must now be restarted to apply the change.
settings.disableSentryRestarting: Server is restarting to apply the new setting...
settings.allowOpDesc: Enable this option to allow OP (operator) commands on the server. OP players have elevated permissions.
settings.allowOpHint: Adds the --allow-op flag when starting the server
settings.allowOpRestartNote: After changing this setting, the server must be restarted for the change to take effect.
settings.allowOpRestartRequiredDesc: The setting has been changed. The server must now be restarted to apply the change.
settings.allowOpRestarting: Server is restarting to apply the new setting...
settings.recommendedPluginsDesc: These plugins are maintained by Hytale's official development partners for server hosting needs.
settings.pluginWebServerDesc: Base plugin for web applications and APIs
settings.pluginQueryDesc: Exposes server status (player counts, etc.) via HTTP
settings.pluginPerformanceSaverDesc: Dynamically limits view distance based on resource usage
settings.pluginPrometheusDesc: Exposes detailed server and JVM metrics for monitoring
settings.recommendedPluginsNote: These plugins are not included in the panel. Visit CurseForge or official sources to download them.

users.title: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage panel users
users.leaveBlank: Leave blank to keep current password
users.moderatorDesc: Can manage server but not users
users.operatorDesc: Can view dashboard, console, performance and restart server

activity.title: Activity Log
activity.subtitle: Track all actions performed on the server
activity.confirmClear: Really clear the entire activity log?

commands.title: Command Reference
commands.clickToCopy: Click copy button to copy command

kick.desc: Kick a player from the server

ban.desc: Ban a player from the server

heal.desc: Heal a player to full health

effectApply.desc: Apply an effect to a player

effectClear.desc: Clear all effects from a player

top.desc: Teleport to the top of the world

scheduler.title: Scheduler & Automation
scheduler.subtitle: Configure automated backups, announcements and quick commands
scheduler.autoBackupsDesc: Automatically create backups at a scheduled time every day
scheduler.restartsDesc: Automatically restart the server at scheduled times with advance warnings
scheduler.warningMinutesHint: Comma-separated list of minutes before restart for warnings
scheduler.warningMessageHint: Use {minutes} as placeholder for remaining minutes
scheduler.broadcastDesc: Send a message to all online players
scheduler.announcementsDesc: Send periodic messages and welcome new players
scheduler.welcomeHint: Use {player} as placeholder for player name
scheduler.quickCommandsDesc: One-click server commands for common actions

webmap.title: Web Map
webmap.subtitle: Live server map with real-time player tracking
webmap.notInstalledDesc: The EasyWebMap mod is not installed. Install it from the Mod Store to enable the live web map feature.

roles.title: Role Management
roles.subtitle: Manage user roles and permissions
roles.name: Role Name
roles.systemRoleNote: System roles cannot be renamed or deleted. Only permissions can be modified.
roles.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{name}"?

assets.title: Asset Explorer
assets.subtitle: Browse and analyze Hytale game assets
assets.globExamples: *.json (all JSON), sign*.json (starts with sign), data/**/*.png (all PNG in data)

commands.kick: Kick a player from the server
commands.ban: Ban a player from the server
commands.opAdd: Give operator permissions to a player
commands.opRemove: Remove operator permissions from a player
commands.whitelistAdd: Add a player to the whitelist
commands.whitelistRemove: Remove a player from the whitelist
commands.statsSettomax: Set a player stat to maximum value
commands.statsSet: Set a specific stat value for a player
commands.effectApply: Apply an effect to a player
commands.effectClear: Clear all effects from a player
commands.inventoryOpen: Open inventory management for a player
commands.say: Broadcast a message to all players
commands.tell: Send a private message to a player
commands.tpPlayer: Teleport a player to another player
commands.tpWorld: Teleport a player to coordinates in a specific world
commands.top: Teleport to the highest block at current position
commands.summon: Spawn an entity at a location
commands.entityKill: Kill entities by type or all
commands.clone: Clone an area to another location
commands.xpAdd: Add experience points to a player
commands.xpSet: Set experience points for a player

setup.systemCheckDescription: Verifying system requirements for the Hytale Panel
setup.languageInfo: You can change the language anytime in the settings after setup.
setup.createAdminDescription: Create your admin account to access the panel
setup.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
setup.usernameTooLong: Username must be at most 32 characters
setup.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
setup.passwordHint: Use a strong password with at least 12 characters
setup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 12 characters
setup.securityNoticeText: Your password will be securely hashed. Make sure to remember it, as it cannot be recovered.
setup.serverNameHint: The name displayed in the server list (3-64 characters)
setup.serverNameTooShort: Server name must be at least 3 characters
setup.serverNameTooLong: Server name must be at most 64 characters
setup.motdHint: A short message shown to players when they join
setup.motdTooLong: MOTD must be at most 256 characters
setup.maxPlayersHint: The maximum number of players allowed on the server
setup.gameModeHint: The game mode new players will start with
setup.serverConfigInfo: These settings can be changed later in the Configuration section.
setup.securitySettingsDescription: Configure server access and security options
setup.serverPasswordHint: Players must enter this password to join (optional)
setup.serverPasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 4 characters
setup.serverPasswordTooLong: Password must be at most 32 characters
setup.whitelistDescription: Only players on the whitelist can join the server. You can manage the whitelist after setup.
setup.allowOperatorDescription: Allow trusted players to receive elevated permissions via the /op command.
setup.allowOperatorWarning: Operators have full server control. Only grant OP status to players you fully trust.
setup.securityTip1: Use a strong server password if your server is public
setup.securityTip2: Enable whitelist to control who can join
setup.securityTip3: Only grant OP to trusted administrators
setup.automationSettingsDescription: Configure automatic backups and server restarts
setup.automaticBackupsDescription: Automatically create backups of your server data
setup.backupRetentionHint: Older backups will be automatically deleted
setup.automaticRestartsDescription: Schedule automatic server restarts for maintenance
setup.warnBeforeRestartDescription: Players will receive a 5-minute warning before the server restarts
setup.automationSettingsInfo: Automation settings help maintain server performance and prevent data loss.
setup.performanceSettingsDescription: Configure server resource allocation and performance
setup.serverRamDescription: Set minimum and maximum RAM for the game server
setup.ramMinExceedsMax: Minimum RAM cannot exceed maximum RAM
setup.ramRecommendation10: Recommended: 3-4 GB for up to 10 players
setup.ramRecommendation20: Recommended: 4-6 GB for up to 20 players
setup.ramRecommendation50: Recommended: 6-8 GB for up to 50 players
setup.viewRadiusDescription: How far players can see (in chunks)
setup.viewRadiusWarningMedium: Higher view radius increases RAM usage. Consider lowering for better performance.
setup.viewRadiusWarningHigh: Very high view radius significantly impacts performance. Only recommended for powerful servers.
setup.viewRadiusHint: Lower values improve performance but reduce visibility. Default is 16 chunks.
setup.serverDownloadDescription: Choose how to set up the Hytale server files
setup.hytaleAuthDescription: Authenticate with Hytale to download server files
setup.downloadMethodOfficialDesc: Download server files directly from Hytale using OAuth authentication
setup.downloadMethodCustomDesc: Use custom URLs to download server JAR and Assets
setup.downloadMethodManualDesc: Server files are already present in the server directory
setup.openLinkInBrowser: Open this link in your browser to authenticate:
setup.downloadInfoNotice: Download times depend on your internet connection speed
setup.autoUpdateDescription: Automatically update server files when a new version is available
setup.extractAssetsDescription: Extract game assets for enhanced panel features like item icons and texture previews
setup.extractingAssetsDescription: Please wait while game assets are being extracted...
setup.extractionCompleteDescription: Game assets have been extracted successfully
setup.extractionSkippedDescription: Asset extraction was skipped. You can extract assets later from the Assets page.
setup.extractAssetsOptionDesc: Extract textures, icons and other assets from Assets.zip for enhanced panel features
setup.skipExtractionOptionDesc: Skip asset extraction for now. You can extract assets later from the Assets page.
setup.extractStorageWarning: Note: Extraction requires approximately 2-3 GB of additional disk space
setup.featureItemImagesDesc: Display icons for items and blocks in inventory views
setup.featurePrefabPreviewsDesc: Preview prefabs and structures in the world editor
setup.featureAssetBrowserDesc: Browse and search all game assets directly in the panel
setup.featureTexturePreviewsDesc: View texture files for blocks, items and entities
setup.extractionInfoNotice: Extraction may take several minutes depending on your system
setup.extractionSuccessDesc: All game assets have been extracted and are ready to use
setup.extractionSkippedInfo: You can extract assets later from Settings > Assets

serverAuth.authenticatedDesc: Your server has been successfully authenticated with Hytale
